DOC.brief_summary: Analysis of long term outcomes of patients undergoing endoscopic mucosal resection for Barrett's oesophagus with high grade dysplasia and/or early intramucosal carcinoma (IMC).
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Barrett's Endoscopic Mucosal Resection Study
DOC.criteria: 18 years or over Have or have had Barrett's Oesophagus Do not have Barrett's Oesophagus Have not had Barrett's Oesophagus resected at Westmead Hospital
